parameters.name: from email
parameters.description: Email address of the sender, optional with name.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Plain text message of the email.

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: HTML text message of the email.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: Name of the binary properties that contain data to add to the email as an attachment. Multiple ones can be comma-separated.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for sending the email.

options.name: allowunauthorizedcerts
options.description: Whether to connect even if SSL certificate validation is not possible.

options.name: replyto
options.description: The email address to send the reply to.

parameters.subject: Hello from n8n
parameters.text: This is a test email from n8n.
